body_html:
Indeed contributions welcome is a good fit. In principle the gradient of tf.broadcast_to is just tf.reduce_sum on the indices which were broadcasted.

A pull request to add this gradient should just add a call to ops.RegisterGradient for broadcast_to which calls tf.reduce_sum with the appropriate indices.
body_text:
Indeed contributions welcome is a good fit. In principle the gradient of tf.broadcast_to is just tf.reduce_sum on the indices which were broadcasted.
A pull request to add this gradient should just add a call to ops.RegisterGradient for broadcast_to which calls tf.reduce_sum with the appropriate indices.
body:
Indeed contributions welcome is a good fit. In principle the gradient of tf.broadcast_to is just tf.reduce_sum on the indices which were broadcasted.

A pull request to add this gradient should just add a call to ops.RegisterGradient for broadcast_to which calls tf.reduce_sum with the appropriate indices.
